projects.title: Landscape Design Research Based On Ecological Restoration--Reconstruction on Shougang  Second General Machine Industrial Sites
projects.description: With the development of our city and its deepening update, the city cultural relics including industrial construction sites have attracted more attention. For these industrial construction sites, to be reserved or removed, and how to be protected or developed have become a hot issue in transformation and renewal of old city sites of modern city design. This passage takes the update and transformation of old industrial construction sites in Shougang for example. On the base of the preliminary research and analysis, including the base location, the size of the project, municipal transportation, environment analysis, functional status, the status of green, the ground situation analysis and so on, it puts forward a design scheme based on the ecological restoration and reconstruction of culture. In technology, it mainly adopts physical means to combine the ecological restoration (including soil and water purification etc.) with landscape. In visual form, it introduces agricultural landscape to contrast with industrial sites, resulting in more powerful and attractive landscape level. At the same time, according to the site location and the characteristics of surrounding industrial culture, and to guide people’s actions by space design naturally, it aims at establishing a new landscape, function of order and unique aesthetic standard for the industrial site and reconstructing the local cultural development, in order to achieve the  purpose of sustainable development of the ecology and culture , then puts forward practical methods for transformation of the city industrial construction sites.

contributors.headline: Academy of Art and Design, Tsinghua University

projects.title: Post-disaster reconstruction design project of Xinjiang GroupXueshan Village of Sichuan Provence
projects.description:
Located in Xinjiang Group, Xueshan Village, Ya’an City, Sichuan Province, China, this base has a mean sea level of about 1000M. Affected by the earthquake, 80% of houses in the village collapsed, the ancient buildings which were survivedfrom the earthquake still stand tall and upright there, 20% houses were slightly damaged,thus a reconstruction of the whole village is urgently needed at present.
In terms of selection of villages construction material, thebamboo panel is adopted as building forms of elevation. First, with an extensive planting area of and the short growth circle of bamboo, the zoology will be restored rapidly. Second, environmental protection is also a main factor for consideration. The construction form will givepriority to rectangle. Through serial and parallel connection, thisconstruction aims to enhance the sense of history of the village fields, so that after the earthquake, the residents can still go on living according to their original habit.
In terms of planting, the mature seeds of green needle leaves, little amount of seeds of deciduous broad-leaved forest and the common shrub are adopted. In the meantime, the vast area of vegetable garden of the village and the walnut area are in the northwest corner are retained.

contributors.headline: Academy of Art and Design, Tsinghua University

projects.title: Growing Yard
projects.description: The central urban area of the ancient capital of Henan Province, Kaifeng possesses both diverse cultural buildings and heritage sites. In the area, Liu Qingxia’s Original Residence Cultural Protection Zone is a national protection site. In terms of the adopted protection method, on the one hand, within absolute control zone, the protection zone is strictly retained and the original building is fully demonstrated. On the other hand, beyond the absolute protection zone and building’s control zone, the outdoor landscape (roof greening) in the plan should try to be organically integrated with the newly constructed building both in the style and material’s colors. In addition, the urban texture and cultural experience should be extended.

contributors.headline: Academy of Art and Design, Tsinghua University

projects.title: Chao Yi（chair）
projects.description: The eldlerly is the end stage of evolution of human life. Personally, emotion and memory are often the whole life of seniors. From a social standpoint, empty-nesters is one of most concerned social topics now. This project is based on these two aspects. Usually the sphere structure includes an aspect of interesting and tries to give memory and feelings for seniors. If we could transform the "nest" of empty-nesters into a basic shape, it may be the sphere structure as well. So I try to use the accumulation of the sphere structure to create a basic structure of chair. At the same time, there are two movable components on the chair back. On the one hand, these generate certain interaction and dialogue between visitors and the chair. On the other hand, "empty nest" is real, warm, careful "nest" rather than "empty nest".

contributors.headline: Academy of Art and Design, Tsinghua University

projects.title: Floating people-Overlook  2013 Tsinghua University - The program of whole environment transformation design of Luohu in Shenzhen
projects.description:
Luohu is a supplementary passenger and cargo comprehensive port that serves Yantian & Longgang of Shenzhen and the east part of Peal River Delta. It is 12 kilometers from the downtown area, its cross-border traffic accounted for 8% of the total volume in 1997, and it was established and put into use in 1985. On January 28th, 2005, the new port cross-border bridge was put into use; in 2009, the closing time was delayed, and in July, the passenger flow volume reached 200,000, which was 180,000 in June (the designed daily traffic flow is 1500, and the designed passenger flow is 1500.)
Now, the function of Luohu port don't meet people need extremely with the increseing number of travellers and visiting relatives between Mainland and Hong Kong. The purpose of this program is aim to solve many primary problems such as traffic, clearance efficiency, commerce and else.

profile_positions.company: Intern, Beijing Tsinghua Holding Shuimu Construction Engineering Co., Ltd., Beijing, China
profile_positions.title: Internship

volunteer_experiences.description: There was a First Shenzhen Internaional Low Carbon City Forum on 8, Jun, 2013. I took part in this organization and became a volunteer. My main job was to guide guests and be a consultant for participants. What's more, I could learn a lot of knowledge associated with my profession from this forum during those two days. I was very enjoy a good time.

In 2015, I participated with Rode Kruis Tilburg and became a volunteer. My main job was to collect many necessities such as clothes, shoes and cosmetics etc for refugees. For escaping from war they came to The Netherlands for exsitence. That's why I want to help them.

On Feb, 2016, I went to the nursing home in Tilburg called The Kivietshorst for looking after the elderly and disabled people. This acitivity we organized brought happiness and care for them. In addiation, we played many funny games together. We enjoyed a good afternoon.

There are five committees of AWAKE International organization. I participated in three of them such 
as Sustainable Environmental committee, Voluntary Work committee and Information and Communication Technologies committee(ICT).

The vegetable garden project focuses on adults with or without disabilities. In the surrounding gardens are various herbs and vegetables used for cooking initiatives crossroads and local residents. As a volunteer, I can also make free use of these products. I assisted people with disabilities, provided tips on vegetable glands and ensured maintenance.
A person from South Sudan will come to Tilburg city of The Netherlands on March 2016.
